name: More Modern Art Randomness Quiz | Art | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following women were never with Pablo Picasso?
Who was a founding member of the Vienna Sezession?
What is another name for Duchamp's 'The Bride Stripped Bare by Her Bachelors, Even'?
In his self-portraits, what object did Magritte place in front of his face?
questions.correct: apple & an apple & a green apple & green apple
questions.explanation:
apple & an apple & a green apple & green apple.

	He refused to create a representation of his own face, which he felt was not fit to paint...

questions.text: Which Mexican artist led the group who made the first attempt on Leon Trotsky's life?
questions.explanation:
David Siqueiros.

	The first unsuccessful attempt on Trotsky's life ended with only a minor injury to Trotsky's grandson, Seva, who was shot in the foot.

questions.text: Which architect designed the St. Louis arch?

She was an American dancer who employed long iridescent veils which she would swing into billowing forms. Perfume would be sprayed into the audience as multi-colored lights highlighted her serpentine movements. She inspired sculptures by Leonard, Riviere and Larche, among others, what was her name?
From what country did Constantin Brancusi migrate to Paris?
Which of these architects created organic abstract forms for his buildings, in which each room resembled a living cell?
Whose first Paris exhibition occured in 1901?
